text: læa brrda phu yakerng phracea khxng phwk khea ca thuk na su swn swrrkh penk lum «cnkrathang meux phwk khea ma thung man læa pratu thanghlay khxng man ca thuk peid xxk yam fea pratu swrrkh ca klaw kæ phwk khea wa khwam santi cng mi dæ phwk than phwk than pen phu brisuththi dangnan cng kheapi nı swrrkh pen phu phanak xyu tlxd kal
